objects.text:
• Premium Wool-Blend Construction
• Sophisticated Camel Color
• Oversized Silhouette Design
• Single-Button Closure

product_details.name: Luxe Oversized Camel Wool Coat - Timeless Elegance for Modern Professionals
product_details.description:
• Premium quality wool-blend construction for warmth and durability
• Sophisticated camel color perfect for versatile styling
• Oversized silhouette with dropped shoulders for contemporary appeal
• Wide lapel collar design adds classic sophistication
• Single-button closure for effortless wear
• Deep side pockets for functionality
• Rolled cuff detail for refined finishing
• Mid-length cut suitable for both casual and formal occasions
• Perfect layering piece for fall/winter wardrobe
• Available in sizes XS-XL for inclusive fit options
• Easy-care fabric blend maintains shape after wear
• Pairs beautifully with office wear and weekend attire

banner_details:
The banner features a modern, fashion-forward layout with a balanced grid background split into soft beige tones, arranged in quadrants. The left section includes three main text elements: a prominent headline (`heading`) rendered in a classic serif font, a stylish tagline (`tagline`) in a sleek sans-serif typeface, and a detailed product description (`description`) highlighting features of a luxury coat. The right section showcases an image of a model in the product (`product_image`). The price is emphasized in bold typography (`price`) above a dark button (`cta_button_background`) that includes a clear call-to-action (`cta`). The design blends elegance with clarity, perfect for high-end product showcases.

**Color Palette:**  
- Warm Beige (#F0E6DD)  
- Soft Blush (#E6D5C8)  
- Neutral Taupe (#D6C3B6)  
- Camel Brown (#C0AA9A)  
- Rich Mocha (#5D4A41)  
- Accent Grey (#8B7D75)  
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases an elegant, neutral-toned outfit ideal for sophisticated fashion advertising. The color palette is grounded in warm, earthy neutrals. The camel beige coat (#C8A98D) serves as the dominant color, presenting luxury and warmth. The trousers complement with a slightly darker taupe brown (#A48C75), creating depth without disrupting harmony. The crisp white blouse (#FFFFFF) adds contrast to the subdued palette, enhancing brightness and cleanliness. Accessories, including gold buttons (#D4AF37) and muted emerald green heels (#2F4D45), accentuate the ensemble with subtle contrast. This palette blends seamlessly while distinctive color highlights boost attention and visual interest in a minimalistic fashion banner.
